definition: to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: But am I going to devote all my spare time to it?
sentences.chinese: 但我會把全部的空閒時間都消磨在拼字上嗎？

sentences.english: When dinner was over, we started a Scrabble game.
sentences.chinese: 喫完晚飯後我們開始做拼字遊戲。

sentences.english: We're playing Scrabble. That's how bad it is.
sentences.chinese: 我倆正在玩拼字遊戲，這就是糟糕之所在。

sentences.english: “Now, click on the Scrabble icon, ” I instructed.
sentences.chinese: “來，點擊拼字遊戲圖標，”我指示道。

sentences.english: A：Winning the spelling bee has really gone to Brian’s head.
sentences.chinese: 布萊恩在拼字比賽中拿了冠軍，讓他自覺不可一世。

sentences.english: What is to be represented, and how? The Haitian Creole orthographic debates.
sentences.chinese: 要表現什麼？如何表現？海地克理奧爾拼字法的爭論。

sentences.english: Dan: Who would have thought scrabble could be so therapeutic?
sentences.chinese: 誰能想到拼字遊戲能泄漏“心”機。

sentences.english: The White House hosts movie nights and the family play Scrabble together.
sentences.chinese: 白宮會舉行電影之夜，奧巴馬一家會一起玩拼字遊戲。

sentences.english: OMIT】He made many mistakes in spelling by omitting letters.
sentences.chinese: 他因漏掉字母而犯了許多拼字上的錯誤。

sentences.english: More so than a lot of games, Scrabble seems to have universal appeal.
sentences.chinese: 拼字遊戲比其它許多遊戲更顯出其廣泛的號召力。

sentences.english: Dictionaries also can arbitrate disputes that arise during a game of Scrabble or late-night conversations.
sentences.chinese: 字典也可以仲裁拼字遊戲或午夜談話中出現的爭執。

sentences.english: You're the best speller l know.
sentences.chinese: 你是我見過的最會拼字的人。

sentences.english: He joined the Cub Scouts and placed second in the fifth grade spelling bee.
sentences.chinese: 他參加童子軍，在五年級的時候獲得拼字比賽亞軍。

sentences.english: He walks over to her, takes off the gag and challenges Laura to play the Word Game .
sentences.chinese: 他走向勞拉，取下口中物體，打算玩一把拼字遊戲。

sentences.english: Among the subjects we discussed was Bengali orthography.
sentences.chinese: 在我們討論過的話題當中，有孟加拉語的拼字法。

definition: to pronounce a word after mentally processing its spelling/(phonics) blending
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
new character (in textbook)/character that is unfamiliar or not yet studied
single Chinese character/word (in a foreign language)
Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
